parameters.name: YSpacingDim

parameters.name: AngleDim
parameters.description: True to display the angle dimension between axes in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: CreateNumOfInstancesDimInXDir
parameters.description: True to display the number of instances in the x direction dimension in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: CreateNumOfInstancesDimInYDir
parameters.description: True to display the number of instances in the y direction dimension in the graphics area, false to not

parameters.name: Seeds
parameters.description: Array of the names of the entities, separated by the underscore character (_), that comprise the seed pattern (e.g., Line1_Line2_Line3_Line4 for a rectangular-shaped seed pattern)
